title: Animation on film
brief_description: An introduction to the principles and techniques of film animation, the equipment needed - the rostrum, animation bench, and mounting of the camera are discussed. The planning of animation, and the care and accuracy needed throughout all stages are shown in detail. Roland Kemp is animation advisor.
